General.Name: Mullen Automotive Inc
General.Description: Mullen Automotive, Inc., an electric vehicle company, manufactures and distributes electric vehicles. Its products include passenger electric vehicles and commercial vehicles; and provides solid-state polymer battery technology. The company is headquartered in Brea, California.
General.Address: 1405 Pioneer Street, Brea, CA, United States, 92821
